links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (20,-99).
formula: a(n) = (11^n-9^n)/2. - Bruno Berselli, Feb 09 2011a(0)=1, a(n)=11*a(n-1)+9^n. [From Vincenzo Librandi, Feb 09 2011]a(0)=1, a(1)=20, a(n)=20*a(n-1)-99*a(n-2). [From Vincenzo Librandi, Feb 09 2011]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
